description: The first recruited member of BECK, Taira is the bassist, and the most talented band member next to Ryusuke. He plays a Music Man StingRay bass, as well as a Fender Jazz Bass. His attitude may sometimes come off as uncaring. He has been seen working as a traffic officer. He is the most mature person of all of the band members, often giving helpful advices.
name: Taira Yoshiyuki
